verses.name: Ezekiel 37:1
verses.text: The hand of the Lord was upon me, and carried me out in the spirit of the Lord, and set me down in the midst of the valley which was full of bones,

verses.name: Ezekiel 37:2
verses.text: And caused me to pass by them round about: and, behold, there were very many in the open valley; and, lo, they were very dry.

verses.name: Ezekiel 37:3
verses.text: And he said unto me, Son of man, can these bones live? And I answered, O Lord God, thou knowest.
